archimate:Node.name: [Comcam Test Stand] Compute and storage ITC (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation:
The Spectrograph Test Stand is a node that supports the comcam Archiver, supporting control systems and a disk buffer that is not required to be a fully functional Observatory Operations server. The buffer exposes recently acquired data from the spectrograph camera to users of the comcam test stand. teh node also proves an EFD EFT capability.
This node is deployed in Tucson
